alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 16 at 3:35AM EDT until July 17 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation in the most vulnerable shoreline locations. * WHERE...Eastern Massachusetts coast, including Cape Cod and the Islands. * WHEN...Late tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on the most vulnerable low lying roads and property. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour.
